example.name: passive, arg1 only

roleset.name: bunch up (completive)
roleset.note: BUNCH_UP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on ULA. No VNcls. (from bunch.02-v)

example.name: passive with arg2
example.text: Most new saloons were small and the bars short , accommodating with difficulty the many bunched up *trace*, in ranks , if you will , calling for whiskey .

example.name: no end state
example.text: Kelly bunched up the roses and put them in a vase.

example.name: ergative
example.text: Her sweet old face bunched up into a warm friendly smile of recognition.
example.arg: into a warm friendly smile of recognition
